code: import React from'react';import{CartItemContainer,CartItemInfo,CartItemImage,CartItemDetails,CartItemControls,QuantityControl,QuantityButton,QuantityDisplay,RemoveButton,PriceInfo}from'./CartItem.styles';import{Add,Remove,Delete}from'@mui/icons-material';import{useCart}from'../../context/CartContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CartItem=_ref=>{let{item}=_ref;const{updateQuantity,removeFromCart}=useCart();const handleQuantityChange=newQuantity=>{if(newQuantity<1){removeFromCart(item.id);}else{updateQuantity(item.id,newQuantity);}};const handleRemove=()=>{removeFromCart(item.id);};const totalPrice=(item.price*item.quantity).toFixed(2);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CartItemContainer,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CartItemInfo,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartItemImage,{src:item.img,alt:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CartItemDetails,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Color: ",item.color||'Black'," | Size: ",item.size||'M']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(PriceInfo,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"unit-price",children:["$",item.price," each"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"total-price",children:["$",totalPrice," total"]})]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CartItemControls,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(QuantityControl,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(QuantityButton,{onClick:()=>handleQuantityChange(item.quantity-1),disabled:item.quantity<=1,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Remove,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(QuantityDisplay,{children:item.quantity}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(QuantityButton,{onClick:()=>handleQuantityChange(item.quantity+1),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Add,{})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(RemoveButton,{onClick:handleRemove,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Delete,{}),"Remove"]})]})]});};export default CartItem;
